Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • Menu

  • public class Menu
extends Object
    This class draws the menu and the menu icons and manages the ineractions of the user with the menu and exucute the commands accordingly based on the user interaction
    Version:
    05/03/2014 19:25:28
    Author:
    CRHanna

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int alpha1
      the alpha channels for the biscuits.
      private int alpha2
      the alpha channels for the sugar.
      private int alpha3
      the alpha channels for the toxic.
      private Ant ant
      instance of type Ant.
      private boolean antPressed
      checks if the ant icon is pressed.
      private Colony colony
      instance of type Colony.
      private Food food
      instance of type Food - a single food particle.
      private int hSize
      height of the menu.
      private char letter
      for switch case condition in the setConditions().
      private PVector location
      location vector.
      private int offset
      used for the distribution of the food menu.
      private Predator predator
      instance of type Predator.
      private boolean predatorPressed
      checks if the predator icon is pressed.
      private boolean resetPressed
      checks if the reset icon is pressed.
      private boolean selectBiscuit
      checks if the biscuit is selcted.
      private boolean selected
      checks if the button is selected.
      private boolean selectSugar
      checks if the sugar is selcted.
      private boolean selectToxic
      checks if the toxic is selcted.
      private boolean showPredator
      shows or hides the predator.
      private int typeCount
      used for distributing the count to each food type in a for loop.
      private int value
      used for setting a color value to each icon.
      private int wSize
      width of the menu.
      private float yPosition
      for positioning the type beneath the icons.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addAnt()
      this method is called in the ant class
      void addBiscuitFromMenu(float x, float y, FoodSource f)
      add biscuit and display a biscuit cursor if biscuit was selected
      void addSugarFromMenu(float x, float y, FoodSource f)
      add sugar and display a biscuit cursor if sugar was selected
      void addToxicFromMenu(float x, float y, FoodSource f)
      add toxic and display a biscuit cursor if toxic was selected
      void displayAnt()
      this icon displays the ant as an ican that can be toggled whenever pressed
      void displayBar()
      this draws the menu background as a black rectangle
      void displayFoodMenu()
      this method displays the 3 types of food as icons on the menu it uses the addFoodIcon() method from the FoodSource class which draws the food icon
      void displayPredator()
      this method diplays the image of the predator on the menu and it creates a toggle effect whenever the icon is pressed if it is selected it dims if it is not selected it lits up
      boolean hidePredator()
      this method is called in the Ant class in order to set a condition that if the predator is hidden the ant will die if it enters the predator's home
      void mousePressed(float x, float y, FoodSource biscuit, FoodSource sugar, FoodSource toxic)
      this method detedts the mouse position whether it is over a certain icon when pressed and executes a command accordingly
      void reset()
      this method is used to dispaly the reset button on the menu and color it white whenever pressed however because it resets it turns back to its original color on toggle
      void setToggleConditions()
      this methods sets 3 switch case conditions for controlling the toggling of the food icons on the menu and for controlling the transparency of the text when the icon is selected or deselected
      boolean showPredator()
      It is called in the main sketch in order to activate the Predator's functions

    • Constructor Detail

      • Menu

        public Menu(PVector location,
    Predator predator,
    Colony colony)
        Parameters:
        location - used for positioning the menu and it element on the screen
        predator - for callin the display function form the predator class for displaying the predator icon
        colony - for getting the updated number of ants and display next to the ant icon

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        this method is used to dispaly the reset button on the menu and color it white whenever pressed however because it resets it turns back to its original color on toggle

      • displayPredator

        public void displayPredator()
        this method diplays the image of the predator on the menu and it creates a toggle effect whenever the icon is pressed if it is selected it dims if it is not selected it lits up

      • displayAnt

        public void displayAnt()
        this icon displays the ant as an ican that can be toggled whenever pressed

      • displayFoodMenu

        public void displayFoodMenu()
        this method displays the 3 types of food as icons on the menu it uses the addFoodIcon() method from the FoodSource class which draws the food icon

      • addBiscuitFromMenu

        public void addBiscuitFromMenu(float x,
                      float y,
                      FoodSource f)
        add biscuit and display a biscuit cursor if biscuit was selected

                    float y,
                    FoodSource f)
        add toxic and display a biscuit cursor if toxic was selected

      • setToggleConditions

        public void setToggleConditions()
        this methods sets 3 switch case conditions for controlling the toggling of the food icons on the menu and for controlling the transparency of the text when the icon is selected or deselected

        public void mousePressed(float x,
                float y,

        this method detedts the mouse position whether it is over a certain icon when pressed and executes a command accordingly

      • addAnt

        public boolean addAnt()
        this method is called in the ant class
        Returns:
        true if the ant was selected

      • showPredator

        public boolean showPredator()
        It is called in the main sketch in order to activate the Predator's functions
        Returns:
        returns true if the predator is unhidden

      • hidePredator

        public boolean hidePredator()
        this method is called in the Ant class in order to set a condition that if the predator is hidden the ant will die if it enters the predator's home
        Returns:
        true if the predator was hidden

      • displayBar

        public void displayBar()
        this draws the menu background as a black rectangle
